communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Kinky Friedman
communications.communication:
Dear FBI:

This is a request under the Freedom of Information Act. Please produce all records related to Richard Samet Friedman, better known as Kinky Friedman. Mr. Friedman was born in Chicago, Illinois, USA on November 1, 1944 and died on June 26, 2024 near Medina, Texas.

PROOF OF DEATH:

Mr. Friedman’s news obituary from the Washington Post is attached.

SCOPE OF SEARCH:

In addition to standard practices, please search the Electronic Surveillance (ELSUR) Indices, the Microphone Surveillance (MISUR) Indices, the Physical Surveillance (FISUR) Indices, and the Technical Surveillance (TESUR) Indices.

FORM OF PRODUCTION

I would prefer that you produce responsive records electronically, by email attachment if available or on CD-ROM if not.

Thank you very much.
